Strings.Text: {scroll 0}Yeah, you're right, but\njust take a look at this!!{scroll 1}{timed 140}
{scroll 0}I'm going to find out what\ncaused Forest's death.{scroll 1}{timed 110}
{scroll 0}It looks like he was killed\nby a crow or something.{scroll 1}{timed 95}
{scroll 0}Can you look around\nthe first floor, Jill?{scroll 1}{timed 70}
{scroll 0}You don't have a weapon,\ntake this with you.{scroll 1}{timed 70}
{scroll 2}It's Forest...! He's been\npecked to death by crows...{scroll 1}
